paragraph.text: real estate contracts in town. We are confident that we will serve our clients well and have no desire to lock them into a long term contract. Our clients can cancel the listing contract for no charge,
, with 24 hours notice. The only time our clients cannot cancel is when we are in a pending contact with a buyer (multi-party contract).

title: Increased Marketing to Sell your Home Fast and for More in the Portland Market

We often generate over 100,000 online views per listing. Read our article with statistics from the National Association of Realtors Report explaining

link.text: what exactly makes a home sell

paragraph.text: This amount of internet exposure, coupled with professional, full-service representation, has led to faster and higher-priced house sales for our clients. Our team has sold over 1,000 homes in less than 30 days on the market and over 500 homes in their first weekend on the market.
